basics.name: Uriel Cid
basics.label: Full-Stack developer
basics.summary: With over 6 years of experience in web development, I've had the opportunity to work around Mexico and with companies founded in America. Currently based in Fresno, California, I've contributed to the growth of startups and taken on leadership responsibilities within developer teams. My journey in web development has provided me with a solid foundation to tackle challenges and deliver results effectively.

work.name: University of Orizaba, Mexico
work.summary: I had the opportunity to work at my alma mater, where I faced a legacy system, which was outdated. I upgraded  successfully to a modern system using PHP, PostgreSQL, AJAX, and JavaScript. Additionally, I developed a new system for the university to manage all internal operations, from student registrations and role management to grade validation and submission of government validation documents.
highlights: Enhanced the platform to support more than 1000 students

work.name: Integriapp
work.summary: I developed the backend for the company's main platform using Django and Django Rest Framework. I also implemented an authentication system using JWT, which effectively managed roles and permissions. Additionally, I designed and implemented the company's landing page, enhancing our online presence and user engagement.

work.name: Katzkin, Tijuana
work.summary: I enjoyed helping users worldwide while working at an international company, where I was responsible for managing the ticketing system and overseeing the IT department. Additionally, I initiated a project to improve our shipping department's processes. I developed a Quality System that required taking photos and documenting evidence of products before they were shipped. This new system was implemented company-wide and successfully reduced the number of returns and lost packages.

work.name: Cloud Hunter Solutions, Tijuana
work.summary: I worked with a team to help companies to have online precense, developing landing pages and proffessional emails based on the domain of the company. I work with SMTP servers to manage emails, cloudflare to manage the DNS and prevent attacks.

education.institution: Universidad del Valle de Orizaba, Mexico
